com.googlecode.download.maven.plugin.internal.cache

Class FileBackedIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.download.maven.plugin.internal.cache.FileBackedIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.http.client.cache.HttpCacheStorage

    @ThreadSafe
public final class FileBackedIndex
extends Object
implements org.apache.http.client.cache.HttpCacheStorage
    Persistent cache implementation of the HttpCacheStorage interface, to be used with the Apache HttpClient Cache, using a directory with the copy of the files and a serialized file map.
    Since:
    1.3.1
    Author:
    Paul Polishchuk

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileBackedIndex(Path baseDir, org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log log)
      Creates index backed by file "index.ser" in baseDir.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileBackedIndex

        public FileBackedIndex(Path baseDir,
                       org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log log)
                throws NotDirectoryException
        Creates index backed by file "index.ser" in baseDir. Throws runtime exceptions if baseDir does not exist, not a directory or file can't be created in it.
        Parameters:
        baseDir - directory where the index file should be stored.
        Throws:
        NotDirectoryException
